us.aaronweiss.juicebot.examples

Class MetalGear

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.aaronweiss.juicebot.Bot
      • us.aaronweiss.juicebot.AutoBot
        • us.aaronweiss.juicebot.examples.MetalGear
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client

    public class MetalGear
extends AutoBot
    A bot that says "METAL GEAR" upon seeing its name, Snake. MetalGear serves as a demonstration of JuiceBotDefaults and AutoBots.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aaron Weiss
